name: AudioBook Creator
short_description:
AudioBook Creator is a open source program for everyone! it allows you to record with all the recorders you have available. you can record chapter for chapter and even save your project and then open it later! you can also add sound effects; both made by you or from our sound library!
you can also add background music and ajust the volume on different chapters and sound clips! you can also use our text opener to open the manus: needs to be a text file. and then record while you read from it!
And much more!
summary: A open source program for easy making of audibooks!
